article.title: Boeing to Support P-8A Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Boeing Company, Seattle, Washington, is being awarded a $319,905,801 modification to a previously awarded fixed-price-incentive-fee contract (N00019-09-C-0022) for spares, support equipment and tools, logistics support, trainers, and courseware in support of the low-rate initial production, lot two, P-8A multi-mission maritime aircraft. The Naval Air System Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
